sub_title: Chief Executive Officer at The Fresh Connection
summary: An established and respected leader wIth a strong hands on leadership approach, I have extensive exprerience in a number of leading multinationals prior to joining The Fresh Connection as CEO in 2008. Since joining The Fresh Connection I have guided the business through a significant growth period including the acquisition of a number of subsidiaries.
